text: today we are going to explore the
finding history feature in AWS security
Hub if you aren't familiar with security
Hub security Hub is a cloud security
posture Management Service that
Aggregates organizes and prioritizes
security alerts and findings from
various AWS services and supported
Security Solutions from the AWS partner
Network
as the volume of findings increases it
can be challenging to track the changes
and actions that have been taken on each
finding and it becomes even more
important to perform timely and
effective investigations the finding
history feature in security Hub helps
you track and understand the history of
a security finding let's open a finding
and security hub
updates to findings occur when finding
providers update certain Fields such as
resource details or by using the batch
import findings API
you can update certain Fields such as
workflow status in the AWS Management
console or through the batch update
findings API
foreign
ticketing Incident Management security
information and event management and
automatic remediation Solutions can also
use the batch update findings API to
update findings
this new capability highlights these
various changes and when they occurred
so that you don't need to investigate
this yourself
here I'll start some automation to
modify this finding through the use of a
security Hub custom action Amazon event
Bridge Rule and AWS Lambda function
using the batch import findings API
notice the finding update and the change
reflected in the history of the finding
finding history simplifies how you
operate on a finding by giving you
visibility into the changes made to a
finding over time alongside the rest of
the finding details which reduces the
need for separate tooling or additional
processes
the transparency of the finding history
helps you quickly assess the status of
the finding understand actions already
taken and take the necessary actions to
mitigate risk this feature is available
at no additional cost in AWS regions
where security Hub is available and
appears by default for new or updated
findings finding history is also
available through the security hub apis
